scripts.deploy: rm build/lambda.zip; zip -j build/lambda.zip lambda/*; aws lambda update-function-code --function-name SpotifyLogin --zip-file fileb://build/lambda.zip --no-cli-pager && sleep 1s
scripts.songs: aws lambda invoke --function-name 'Spotify' --payload '{"operation": "syncLikedSongs"}' build/run_output.txt --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out && cat build/run_output.txt
scripts.playlists: aws lambda invoke --function-name 'Spotify' --payload '{"operation": "syncPlaylists"}' build/run_output.txt --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out && cat build/run_output.txt
scripts.duplicates: aws lambda invoke --function-name 'Spotify' --payload '{"operation": "getPlaylistDuplicates"}' build/run_output.txt --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out && cat build/run_output.txt
scripts.noPlaylist: aws lambda invoke --function-name 'Spotify' --payload '{"operation": "getSongsWithoutPlaylist"}' build/run_output.txt --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out && cat build/run_output.txt
